acceptedAnswer.text: File metadata is information stored within a file that describes various properties about the file itself, such as creation date, author, camera settings for images, audio bitrate, and more.

mainEntity.name: Is this metadata extractor free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our metadata extractor is completely free to use with no limitations. All processing happens in your browser, ensuring privacy and security.
Our tool supports all file types including images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP), audio (MP3, WAV, FLAC), video (MP4, AVI, MOV), documents (PDF, DOCX, XLSX), and archives (ZIP, RAR).
